name: Inspector & The Apprentice
description:
Join our discord: https://discord.gg/4euWYre

This is what I'd call flash-fiction gaming!

Take on the role of the apprentice and enter an absurd world where you get to interact with your mentor - an Inspector of sorts.  Go on, have a go, pull his beard or something. Just don't annoy him too much - probably.

  • Includes physics-based interaction.
  • An interactable NPC (no voice recognition).
  • Index controllers supported.
  • Silliness and fun.
  • For all ages.
  • Uses VRK4 (+SteamVR SDK).

Beta (maybe a bit alpha) of the intro to the game minus the intro song.  Fully playable and will probably take around 10minutes or so.

Would be great to hear your feedback!
